categoryTitle: Everything you need for a great night out.

mobileAppsData.description: Beat the lines and get movie tickets with Fandango.<sup>1</sup> Watch trailers, search for movies playing near you, and then buy tickets right from your phone. Since it’s a Palm app, you can add the showtime directly to your calendar. Or email a friend to let them know when and where it’s playing, all with just a tap.<sup>3</sup> With Palm, you’re constantly connected and always up to date.
mobileAppsData.title: Fandango

mobileAppsData.description: Make dinner plans with Open Table, which shows you available reservations.<sup>1</sup> You’re thinking 6:00 but need to confirm it. Keep the app open, launch Messaging, and text your friend. Turns out 7:00 works better. Flip back to Open Table. Ah, there it is—a table for two at 7:00. Done.
mobileAppsData.title: Open Table

mobileAppsData.description: The weather’s been nice lately. So maybe you’d like to have dinner somewhere you can sit outside. Use the Do I Need app to figure out what to wear and what to take with you.<sup>1</sup> Today it’s sunny but tonight it’ll be 57 degrees, so be sure to bring along a sweater.
mobileAppsData.title: Do I Need

mobileAppsData.description: Whether the service was awesome or average, Tip ’em instantly calculates the appropriate gratuity.<sup>1</sup> Just enter the check amount and select the tip percentage you want. Tip ’em will even split the check for you, so you can enjoy your night instead of worrying about who owes what.
mobileAppsData.title: Tip ’em

mobileAppsData.description: Share your restaurant experience with your friends on Gowalla.<sup>1</sup> Check in, publish it to Facebook<sup>®</sup>, and get your passport stamped so you can earn rewards. While you’re thinking of it, launch the Facebook app and see what your friends are doing tonight—or send a tweet using Bad Kitty. Palm lets you keep more than one app open at the same time. Then flip back to Gowalla and look up other fun spots near you.<sup>3</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: Gowalla

mobileAppsData.description: Loved your meal at that new bistro? Give it a thumbs-up with GoodFood and tell people what made it so good.<sup>1</sup> If you’re writing a note about dinner and a message notification arrives, you can see the message without losing track of what you’re doing. If it’s not urgent, you can simply swipe it off the screen to deal with later.<sup>3</sup>
mobileAppsData.title: GoodFood

mobileAppsData.description: The movie was great, now where did you park your car? The Parking Place app can help you find it.<sup>1</sup> See where you parked by entering location details like section, level, and color. Or log your parking spot using GPS, and get directions back to it later.<sup>3</sup> Parking Place will even show you the remaining time on your meter so you don’t get a ticket.
mobileAppsData.title: Parking Place

categoryDescription: Say you’re in the mood for dinner and a movie. Palm has the best apps for planning your night and making the most of it. Plus lots of other apps that come in handy when you’re out and about.<sup>1</sup> Either way, you’re able to keep multiple apps open at once and respond to incoming notifications—so you never miss a thing.<sup>2,3</sup>

footnotes.text: 2. Performance varies based upon actual usage.
